bibl.title: Marriage and Matrimonial Property in Ancient Egypt. A contribution to establishing the legal position of the woman.
bibl.seg: Pestman P.W., Marriage and Matrimonial Property in Ancient Egypt. A contribution to establishing the legal position of the woman. (Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. IX.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 1961, 4°, xii-232 pp. et 4 diagrammes.

C.R. par C. Kunderewicz, JJurP 15 (1965) pp. 445-447. - H.J. Wolff, ZSav 80 (1963) pp. 411-417. - V. Polácek, ChrEg 38 (1963) No. 75, pp. 96-100. - Ed. Volterra, Iura 13 (1962) pp. 296-302. - E. Seidl, RHD 30 (1962) pp. 381-387. - H.S. Smith, JEA 48 (1962) pp. 172-176.
